author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Jipmer has been awarded ‘IAB Blind Empowerment Champions 2016’ by the Indian Association of the Blind (IAB) in recognition of its services to the empowerment of the visually challenged.

The award was presented in Madurai during the 31st annual day programme and award ceremony for Blind Empowerment Champions 2016 celebrated on the campus of IAB. Dr. S.C. Parija, Director, Jipmer, said that the award is very special as it comes as an appreciation of Jipmer’s holistic treatment approach. He added that Jipmer will work more closely with various government and NGOs.
title: IAB honours Jipmer with award
